name: Audiophile E-commerce
description: A multi-page e-commerce website using React, react-router-dom, react-hook-form and styled-components. Working with states proved to be a real challenge in this project.

name: Designo Website
description: A 7-page, fully responsive project for a fictional company. This was my first time using TypeScript and my first contact with a strongly typed language. It was a good opportunity to learn the benefits of the language over JavaScript.

name: Entertainment App
description: Web app built using TypeScript, Next.js, Material UI, and Firebase. Gets info about the current movies and TV series and allows users to bookmark them.

name: Invoice App
description: A full-stack app built with the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js) where users can create, delete, edit and read invoices.

name: Photosnap Website
description: A multi-page marketing website for a fictional photo-sharing app. Building this project helped me understand a lot more about CSS Grid.

name: Go-Japan Website
description: Website built using Next.js to Wayfarer Hotels and scrapes news about Japanâ€™s border status and shows information about the company hotels and careers.
